document_data.name: Tower of Iron Will
document_data.Effects: The ''tower of iron will power'' was perhaps the best psionic defense a psionicist could deploy against psionic attacks. The best attack that had a chance of penetrating it was the ''[[id insinuation]]''.

Notable Users.Creatures & Sentient Races:
* [[Kirre]], a psionically-gifted [[tiger]]-like creature native to the desert world of [[Athas]].
* [[Pyreen]], an ancient and mysterious [[humanoid]] race of psionicists also native to Athas.<ref>
Notable Users.Individuals:
* [[Gaulauntyr]], an adult [[copper dragon]].{{Cite web/Wyrms of the North/Gaulauntyr, "Glorytongue"}}{{Gaulauntyr race}}
* [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
